content: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>  <reference anchor='RFC7479'>  <front> <title>Using Ed25519 in SSHFP Resource Records</title> <author initials='S.' surname='Moonesamy' fullname='S. Moonesamy'> <organization /></author> <date year='2015' month='March' /> <abstract> <t>The Ed25519 signature algorithm has been implemented in OpenSSH.  This document updates the IANA "SSHFP RR Types for public key algorithms" registry by adding an algorithm number for Ed25519.</t></abstract></front>  <seriesInfo name='RFC' value='7479' /> <format type='TXT' octets='6440' target='http://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc7479.txt' /> </reference>
